text: Ogoh ʙosed! Sumo kasone hasted, ki ʙaroi infoq dar rohi Alloh taolo da'vat mesaved, vale ʙarxe az sumo ʙuxl mevarzand va har ki ʙuxl ʙivarzad, ʙa zijoni xes ʙuxl varzidaast va Alloh taolo ʙenijoz ast va [in sumo hasted, ki] nijozmanded va agar [az islom ʙa suji kufr] ʙozgarded, Alloh taolo guruhi digarero cojguzinaton xohad kard, ki hamcun sumo [ʙa ʙuxl muʙtalo] naʙosand
